title: For Sale:  2 Pump Shotguns for Parts or project. Both will fire.  westernfield and american eagle
postcontent:
Up for grabs I have two pump shotguns. I bought them as project guns, but I have become preoccupied with other projects, and just haven't got the time to finish them. 

The top one is an American Eagle model 66 an exact copy of the more popular Noble 60 shotgun. It has a 3inch chamber and adjustable choke.  I have replaced a few parts on it and it does fire. The only problems I am aware of is the magazine tube cartridge stopper is missing so it tries to load too many rounds at once.  This is a 7 dollar part online but last time I checked they were sold out. Also the choke needs some work.

The bottom shotgun is a Westernfield XNH 560 8A. It also fires, but the trigger guard is broken and is missing the magazine tube spring, and a few other internals I cant remember the names of.  It does however have a really neat adjustable choke on it. It is chambered for 2 3/4 shells. 

Buy both for 200
or the American eagle for 130
and the westernfield for 100

Call text or email 417/299/0411
willing to ship to an FFL, locals sales must have MO drivers license.

title: For Sale:  M1A Archangel Adjustable Precision Stock
postcontent:
The ProMag Archangel M1A precision rifle stock is a fully adjustable synthetic stock. Constructed of lightweight and durable carbon reinforced polymer. The stock features a thumb wheel adjustable cheek riser. The length of pull is adjustable from 13-5/8" to 14-13/16". The stock features 4 quick detach push-button sling swivel mounts, two on the right side and two on the left side of the stock and two standard QD sling swivels on the bottom of the stock. The pistol grip features a storage compartment and the forend has an integrated picatinny accessory rail.

I had this on my M1A for only a few months, and it has only been used while firing about 50 rounds. It is a great addition for any M1A at an affordable price. I also have a Fulton Armory rail system (http://www.armslist.com/posts/4934119/columbus-georgia-gun-parts-for-sale--m1a-fulton-armory-rail-hanguard) listed on Armslist for an M1A if interested. title: For Sale:  AERO PRECISION AR-15 STRIPPED LOWER GHOST GUN NEW IN BOX
postcontent:
EDITED: ONE HAS SOLD, SO THERE'S ONLY ONE LEFT!

For sale, two new-in-box Limited-Edition (Out of Production) Aero Precision "Ghost Gun" stripped lowers. They are Aero's Ghost Gun model, but yes, they are forged lowers WITH SERIAL NUMBERS (sequential serial numbers), a tongue-in-cheek response to CA Senator Kevin de Leon's anti-gun press conference.  Video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJmFEv6BHM0

Notice the safety selector is [D] (for Democrat, LOL), the FIRE selector is " .30 CALIBER CLIP" and the AUTO Selector (Which obviously doesn't work...semi-auto lower) is: /HALF SECOND. It's very funny, rare, and ORIGINAL! The serial number is: GHOST01XXX

These lowers are 100 percent new and left the boxes for pictures only. I've decided to use other lowers in a couple of builds I'm working on, so these are available. Aero Precision is an awesome lower, built from a company that makes airplane parts outside of Seattle, WA, and used to make their lowers for other companies to stamp their names upon. Now, they finally decided to just sell their quality lowers under their brand.

The price of each out-of-production lower is $149 CASH in the Tampa Area. I will listen to reasonable offers.

PLEASE NOTE, THERE ARE TWO NON-NEGOTIABLE ITEMS HERE:

1) I will sell ONLY to a CCW holder...I WILL NOT sell with just a Florida Driver License only...CCW Permit IS required. Sorry, but I NEED to be certain the new owner(s) are legally permitted to own a firearm.

2) The new owner(s) will be signing a receipt with name and address off of a Florida Driver License, for the protection of the new owner and the seller.

If you have any questions or need more pictures, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Thanks for your interest, and be safe.
